column4: is the entire ubuntu community swamped by idiots like me that ruined their computers trying to install the new edition?
define 'ruined', and how you went about to do so
im working on it now, but i deleted a couple of old linux partitions and apparently one of them contained a dual boot screen that was more deeply rooted than i thought it was
the way you put it, that sounds like a severe case of PEBKAC ;)
